price: And they said, “Why was this Qur’an not sent down to a great man from one of the two towns[12]?”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ
footnotes: [12] i.e., Makkah and its neighboring town; Tā’if.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhā al-qur'ānu ʿalā rajulin mina al-qaryatayni ʿaẓīmin
